prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_k7x9s2",
  "name": "Family Flexitarian Regional Twists (SA & Mediterranean, 15-30, Mild, Balanced)",
  "core_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "SouthAfrican",
      "Mediterranean"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "RegionalTwist"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Balanced"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],
    "Allergens": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Moroccan Rub Chicken & Chickpea Couscous Bowls",
  "description": "Quick family bowls with Moroccan-rubbed chicken, veggie chickpea mix, and lemon yoghurt over fluffy couscous. Mild, balanced, and weeknight-friendly with a Mediterranean-North African twist.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Boil water for couscous (about 2.5 cups).",
    "Trim and slice chicken breast into 2 cm strips.",
    "Peel and slice onion.",
    "Deseed and slice bell peppers.",
    "Rinse and drain chickpeas.",
    "Rinse spinach; roughly chop if leaves are large.",
    "Finely chop parsley.",
    "Zest and juice the lemon; set aside.",
    "Peel and mince garlic.",
    "In a small bowl, mix yoghurt with 1 teaspoon lemon zest, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and a pinch of salt."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Toss chicken breast with 1 tablespoon olive oil and Moroccan rub until coated.",
    "Heat a large pan over medium-high heat with 1 tablespoon olive oil; sear chicken 3–4 minutes per side until cooked through; transfer to a plate to rest.",
    "In the same pan, add 1 tablespoon olive oil; sauté onion and bell peppers with a pinch of salt for 4–5 minutes until softened.",
    "Stir in garlic for 30 seconds, then add chickpeas and spinach; cook 2–3 minutes until spinach wilts. Squeeze in 1 tablespoon lemon juice; adjust salt and pepper to taste.",
    "Place couscous in a heatproof bowl with a pinch of salt and 1 teaspoon olive oil; pour over 2.5 cups boiling water, cover, and steam for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork.",
    "Slice the rested chicken.",
    "Assemble bowls: couscous base, top with the chickpea-veg mix and sliced chicken. Spoon over lemon yoghurt and scatter parsley. Finish with extra lemon zest if desired."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "couscous",
      "quantity": "2 cups (dry)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken breast",
      "quantity": "650 g",
      "preparation": "sliced into strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chickpeas",
      "quantity": "2 cups cooked",
      "preparation": "rinsed and drained"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bell peppers",
      "quantity": "2 medium",
      "preparation": "sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "4 cups",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "Moroccan rub",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "3 tablespoons total"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1 large",
      "preparation": "zested and juiced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "yoghurt",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parsley",
      "quantity": "1/4 cup",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Mediterranean",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Balanced"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "RegionalTwist"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
